ReferenceDocuments.name: If the dose was interrupted,
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the dose was interrupted, how long was the interruption?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the duration of treatment interruption.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SUPPEC.QVAL
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. This information could be submitted in a SUPPEC dataset as the value of SUPPEC.QVAL where SUPPEC.QNAM= "ECITRPD" and SUPPEC.QLABEL= "Collected Interruption Duration". Concatenate the collected treatment interruption duration and the duration unit components and create ECITRPD using ISO 8601 Period format. Refer to the current SDTM and SDTMIG for instructions on placement of non-standard variables in SDTM domains.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: In some situations, the duration of the interruption may be calculated from the administration start and end times recorded elsewhere in the CRF.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If interrupted, specify total number of days not given:
